    Generate approximate pseudo-bulk data by random projections

    asap_random_bulk_data.Rd

    Generate approximate pseudo-bulk data by random projections

    asap_random_bulk_data(
  mtx_file,
  mtx_idx_file,
  num_factors,
  r_covar = NULL,
  r_batch = NULL,
  rseed = 42L,
  verbose = FALSE,
  NUM_THREADS = 1L,
  BLOCK_SIZE = 100L,
  do_normalize = FALSE,
  do_log1p = FALSE,
  do_row_std = FALSE,
  KNN_CELL = 10L,
  BATCH_ADJ_ITER = 100L,
  a0 = 1,
  b0 = 1
)

    Arguments

    mtx_file

    matrix-market-formatted data file (bgzip)

    mtx_idx_file

    matrix-market colum index file

    num_factors

    a desired number of random factors

    r_covar

    covariates (default: NULL)

    r_batch

    batch information (default: NULL)

    rseed

    random seed

    verbose

    verbosity

    NUM_THREADS

    number of threads in data reading

    BLOCK_SIZE

    disk I/O block size (number of columns)

    do_normalize

    normalize each column after random projection

    do_log1p

    log(x + 1) transformation (default: FALSE)

    do_row_std

    rowwise standardization (default: FALSE)

    KNN_CELL

    k-NN matching between cells (default: 10)

    BATCH_ADJ_ITER

    batch Adjustment steps (default: 100)

    a0

    gamma(a0, b0) (default: 1)

    b0

    gamma(a0, b0) (default: 1)

    Contents

    Developed by Yongjin Park, Sishir Subedi.
